agilegreconf.title: Agile Grenoble Conf: Thursday, nov. 17th
agilegreconf.description: The great typical day Thursday with a rich program consisting of many tracks, high quality keynotes, surprises, coffee all day and a drink in the late afternoon. Not to mention the now famous 'Before' and 'After', now part of the reasons for coming to Grenoble for that day.
agilegreconf.callforpapers1:
The call for papers for Agile Grenoble Conf will open mid-june.
An early-selection will occur on beginning of july.
The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.callforpapers2:
The call for papers is opened until 3rd September.
An early-selection will occur on sessions registered before July 8, 2016. The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.callforpapers3:
The call for papers is opened until 3rd September.
The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.selection: An early-selection have been done on sessions registered before July 8, 2016

orateurs.title: Speakers
orateurs.description: The Agile Grenoble team is pleased to welcome you at the Word Trade Center on November 17, 2016 for a new day of exchanges around agility. Each year, about 50 speakers of France and other countries contributent to deliver a rich, diverse and high quality program.

themes.title: Retour aux sources de l'agilité
themes.description: Agile Grenoble Conf will be the moment to exchange and share about theses folling lines :
themes.explanation: These themes reminder something ? Then take part of adventure and come explore these 4 agile manifesto values by submitting your idea for the Agile Grenoble Conf day of November 17.

keynotes.title: Keynotes
keynotes.description: In 2016 you'll discover several keynotes: conference opening and early afternoon.

cfp.title: Submission is now closed
cfp.description: Our submission platform remains open in order to allow improving your session description and editing your spear profile as well.

ticket.title: Registration
ticket.description: Registration for Thursday 17 November open on 12 September.
ticket.info: To register on other specicific Agile Grenoble days : Back to main home of site.

register.title: Registrations
register.description: Sorry the conference is sold out. For 8 years the tickets for our conference are sold out every year well in advance.
register.registrationfinished:
When registration will be sold out, you have other options :
  • Take the waiting list,
  • Agile Grenoble Lab on Wednesday,
  • Agile Grenoble Forum on Friday,
  • and all along the year you can participate to the events organized by the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes.

apropos.title: About
apropos.description: The conference Agile Grenoble exists since 2008 and the 2016 edition will be the 9th conference in a row. The event is wholly organized by the volunteers of the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes Grenoble, with of course the support of our sponsors and partners.

cara.title: Club Agile Rhône Alpes (CARA)
cara.description: The CARA is a non-profit association, striving to promote and disseminate agile methods in the Rhône-Alpes area to a large public, with various means: conference, seminars, meetings and partnerships.

program.title: Program
program.nondisponible: 2016 program will be defined... stay tuned!
program.disponible:
The conference program is now available!
You can already view this year sessions and their description.
